heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_puck
heroes.bio_loc: While Puck seems at first glance a mischievous, childish character, this quality masks an alien personality. The juvenile form of a Faerie Dragon, a creature that lives for eons, Puck spends countless millennia in its childish form. So while it is technically true that Puck is juvenile, it will continue to be so when the cities of the present age have sloughed away into dust. Its motives are therefore inscrutable, and what appears to be play may in fact hide a darker purpose. Its endless fondness for mischief is the true indicator of Puck's true nature.
heroes.hype_loc: Puck has a talent for confounding its enemies with playfully elusive mischief. By teleporting to its damaging orb in order to hop short distances, it attacks foes with bursts of silencing dust. By the time its enemies can react, Puck has long since escaped.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Orbs to enemies and silences them

abilities.name: puck_illusory_orb
abilities.desc_loc: Puck launches a magic orb that floats in a straight path, damaging enemy units along the way. At any point, Puck may teleport to the orb's location using Ethereal Jaunt.
abilities.lore_loc: The playful Faerie Dragon delights in confusing others, vanishing and reappearing where unexpected.
notes_loc: The Illusory Orb grants unobstructed vision around its location while it travels.
Jaunting to the Orb will disjoint projectiles.

abilities.name: puck_waning_rift
abilities.desc_loc: Puck teleports to the target location and releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.
abilities.lore_loc: With a mischievous grin, Puck spreads its enchanted powder which disrupts magical flow.
abilities.scepter_loc: Waning Rift now has %scepter_radius% radius and range and knocks enemies back %scepter_pushback% distance over %scepter_pushback_duration% seconds (non-interrupting). Reveals invisible enemy units and wards in the area for %scepter_vision_duration% seconds.

abilities.name: puck_phase_shift
abilities.desc_loc: CHANNELED - Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
abilities.lore_loc: With a quip and flash, Puck returns to the alien dimension from whence it came.
notes_loc: Puck retains collision size while under the effects of Phase Shift.
Issuing any action will cancel Phase Shift.
Puck is invulnerable during Phase Shift.
abilities.shard_loc: Puck's attacks deal bonus magic damage. Puck attacks all enemies within its attack range + %shard_attack_range_bonus% every time it phase shifts.

abilities.name: puck_dream_coil
abilities.desc_loc: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, damaging and leashing them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.
abilities.lore_loc: The Faerie Dragon sows confusion by forcing its enemies to vividly dream about their own mortality.
abilities.scepter_loc: All enemies affected by Dream Coil are attacked based on Puck's attack rate. The attacks continue while the target is stunned if they break the Dream Coil.
